name: LLM + TTS Pipeline
description: A production-ready pipeline that processes user input through an LLM (GPT-4o-mini by default) and converts the response to speech using TTS. Includes streaming support for better user experience.

examples.curlCommand: curl http://localhost:3000/v1/graph:start -X POST -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"input": {"user_input":"What is the weather like today?"}}'

inputExample.user_input: What is the weather like today?

outputExample.text: I don't have access to real-time weather data...
